DOC.brief_summary: To compare safety feasibility Delta-shaped anastomosis Billroth II anastomosis totally laparoscopic distal gastrectomy gastric cancer ( TLDG ) .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Delta-Shaped Billroth II After TLDG
DOC.detailed_description: Methods : 78 consecutive patient underwent TLDG First Hospital Jilin University October 2012 December 2014 enrol study . All patient divide randomly two group : Delta-shaped anastomosis group ( DS group ) Billroth II anastomosis group ( B-II group ) , patient DS group undergo Delta-shaped anastomosis TLDG , patient B-II group underwent Billroth-II anastomosis TLDG.Outcome measure , resect margin , operative time , anastomosis time , number stapler cartridge use , length incision , time first flatus liquid diet , hospital stay postoperative morbidity compare two group .
